group_1.textRight: In truth, we really need you, Lady Toyo…
Can you please at least listen to what we have@to say?

group_1.textLeft: Hmph… I think you might be misunderstood@about "needing" me.

group_1.textRight: Mm…?

group_1.textLeft: It's all the same to me…but Rena and the others@are owed a big apology.
I mean, they got attacked because of@this whole big mistake, yeah?

group_1.textRight: …Your spirits seem to be a bit brighter...

group_1.textLeft: Seriously? I'm actually feeling really depressed@because I got thrown out as a candidate.
Look, even if you kidnapped me, you'd get@nothing out of it. Just give up and go home.

group_1.textRight: I see… But in my eyes, it looked like Lady Himiko@was following her instincts as a mother.

group_1.textLeft: …Huh?

group_1.textRight: No, that's exactly it… She eliminated you from@the succession because you'd be in danger.
Not to mention her younger brother is@working behind the scenes…
The thought of throwing you into the vortex of@political strife must have been unbearable.

group_1.textLeft: H-hang on a second!@What…did you just say…?

group_1.textRight: What do you mean…?

group_1.textLeft: Like, the reason why she…
Is Lady Himiko my…mama?

group_1.textRight: …You really had no idea?

group_1.textLeft: No, I didn't… I don't get it.@There's no reason she'd have to hide it…

group_1.textRight: …I see. This may be the right time to tell you@the truth…
Perhaps Lady Himiko did not want your@father to be known, Lady Toyo.
I suppose that's why she covered@everything up.

group_1.textLeft: My papa…?@Wait, from the way you're speaking…

group_1.textRight: …As you've probably guessed, your father@is the king of our land…King Kukochihiko.
You are not the child of a Cursed God…@You are the union of Yamatai and Kuna.

group_1.textLeft: There's no way… Both lands have been at odds@against each other for ages now…

group_1.textRight: All of it is true… Otherwise, we wouldn't have@pursued you to this extent.
My liege wishes to see you.@Please, my lady…come to Kuna…

group_1.textLeft: E-even you say that…@This is all happening so…so fast, I…
I don't even know anymore!

group_1.textRight: Lady Toyo!

group_1.narration: What the absolute heck…?@Lady Himiko is my mama…?@And not just that...@But the king of Kuna is my papa…?
Naahahahaha… What the heck is my life?@So ridiculous and funny I could just die…
I'm gonna die from how ridiculous this is.
Hey, did Lady Himiko know?@About me being the child of a Cursed God?@No, she did know.@She said that to me herself…
How did it feel?
Everytime people avoided me,@I kept telling myself it was okay,@that they had no choice.
But deep down…I never actually felt that way.@I hated it… I really, REALLY hated it!
But why didn't Lady Himiko@do anything to help me?
She must've been able to@do something about it…@but why didn't she do anything?
If she was my mama...@she would've come to me.@I wanted her to hug me…@I wanted her to praise my efforts…
Lady Himiko…
Mama…
Does…Mama hate me…?

group_1.textCenter: *Pant…* *Pant…*@My legs are killing me…after all that running…

group_1.textLeft: …It's summer, and they've already withered?

group_1.textRight: Yes, on the day before the cursed child came…@Could this be because of her curse?

group_1.textLeft: Let's examine the soil.

group_1.textRight: Oh no, Lady Himiko!@You'll sully your clothes!

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't matter.

group_1.textRight: Huh… I thought Lady Himiko never appeared@in public.

group_1.textLeft: Those are just rumors from her brother.
You're new around these parts,@so you probably don't know,
but Lady Himiko strives to meet as many@of her people as she can.

group_1.textRight: Woah…@Is she gonna whip out a magic spell for us?

group_1.textLeft: It's not magic… The Spirit Arts are a collection@of knowledge for making folks happy.

group_1.narration: Ahh…I see…@I remember now…
―Toyo―@Gramma. Grampa.@I'm gonna master the Spirit Arts for sure…
―Toyo―@I'm gonna make everyone happy@like Lady Himiko does!
―Toyo―@I'm gonna prove that no matter who you are or@how you were born, you're worthy of being alive!
Yeah…it's about standing your ground,@gritting your teeth, and not giving in@to the despair of the world.
That's where it all started for me.
Did I end up in the wrong place@because I got caught up worrying@about who my parents were?@Am I totally lost?
…No, I'm not.
I…I haven't lost anything yet after all.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Toyo! There you are!@We were looking everywhere for you…

group_1.textLeft: …Please gimme your support.
Uwah… It's the child of the Cursed God!

group_1.textRight: Lady Himiko!

group_1.textLeft: …Toyo.@You're still here.

group_1.textRight: I can't leave yet.@I haven't done anything here.

group_1.textLeft: …And what exactly is it that you intend to do?

group_1.textRight: Make people happy.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?!

group_1.textRight: That's why I started learning the Spirit Arts.
To make tons of people happy and smile…@Just like you do, Lady Himiko…
I'm gonna prove that there's no such thing@as a cursed child!

group_1.textLeft: …If you so insist, then prove it.
There are areas where the drought persists…@I order you to go there and help the people.

group_1.textRight: …This is a test?
